column5: Ron Reyns and LucG  Congrats!! PM Me your mailing addresses!!
Ron won?? Do you have the hats in that size? Congrats guys.
Woo Hoo!  I was starting to think this contest was rigged...lol   just kidding...  Thanks TJ & OFC....and to whoever picked my number
DOH! I guess I need to keep on clicking every day.  Congrats guys!
Keep trying!! Ive got a few more!!
Say WHAT.... I'll deliver that Ron guys TJ.. just mail it to me!
Did these hats get autographed by T.J and Roy.  If so i'll buy one

LOL.. Id give hats ive autographed away but I think Id have to pay for people to take them.!!!  Seriously though.. those who are really interested should enter.. GBW, dude.. its only a matter of time.

Awesome!!!!!  I never win anything.... well OK, I lied! ha ha ha  Thanks TJ, BPS, Dave, Pete and JP.   My daughter is looking forward to stealing it from me!  Now TJ, I really want to send you a PM but I know what picture I'm going to see in your profile. I think I will take my chances and give you my mailing address over the forum instead.  Cheers, Ron...
I just hope it's my time soon, LOL!
Yep thats all he need is another HAT good going HollyWood your the only guy I know that is picked fist for a prize table and takes a HAT I bet cupcake does not get this one.
